title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + COVERING INSTITUTIONS AND ASSISTED LIVING 2003 IRE ANNUAL CONFERENCE TIP SHEET "DEATHS, DYING AND FULL DISCLOSURE"
description: This tip sheet from the 2003 IRE Annual Conference provides guidance on investigating suspicious deaths in vulnerable populations, such as the mentally ill, developmentally disabled, and elderly. It discusses state laws, triggers for investigations, common causes of death, and records to request.
